values: If someone is articulate, he or she has the ability to express ideas clearly and effectively.
Alfred’s friends loved talking to him because he was so articulate and intelligent.
v. to give clear and effective utterance to 清晰表达
adj. clearly expressed and easily understood 善表达的
adj. 表达能力强的口齿清楚的，发音清晰的
vt. & vi. 清楚地表达形成关节；(用关节)连接
时态:articulated，articulating，articulates副 词:articulately
